thread.title: Great Rumor: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry Will Be Engaged By Sept. 21
thread.title_full: Great Rumor: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry Will Be Engaged By Sept. 21

title: Great Rumor: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry Will Be Engaged By Sept. 21
text: Great Rumor: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry Will Be Engaged By Sept. 21 Most Popular By Alyssa Bailey Mar 1, 2017 Today in fantastic rumors we hope are true: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry, who have been dating for nine months, may be putting a ring on it very soon…meaning a ROYAL WEDDING could happen this year or next. A "pal" of the couple tells Us Weekly (so take this with a grain of salt) that Prince Harry is planning to propose to Markle near the anniversary of their first date. "They will be engaged by the end of summer." This technically means before September 22, the autumnal equinox, for anyone who wants an exact date. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below The two "have spoken candidly about their future," the source adds. "They see a life together." Right now, the couple is apart, with Markle shooting Suits in Toronto. She'll wrap the series this summer and apparently "feels a move to London is inevitable," the source says. "It's not like Harry can uproot!" A post shared by Meghan Markle (@meghanmarkle) on Dec 3, 2016 at 12:54pm PST Most Popular Markle is "ready to move away from acting," a separate source close to Markle adds. "She's started thinking of the bigger picture." Markle has already spent some time living with Prince Harry this winter , when she stayed in Nottingham Cottage, Kensington Palace's guest home during Suits ' shooting hiatus from December to mid-February. There, she and Prince Harry cooked, and Markle helped make Prince Harry's pad look better ("He has a few more plants, nice candles—and his kitchen is well-stocked too!"). Should Markle leave Suits , she and Prince Harry may join forces to do some humanitarian work. "They speak about maybe working together on a project," a source says. Generally, these two are "so in love," one source tells Us Weekly . "I honestly can't stress how happy she is. Out of 10, I'd say 150." Which, duh.
